text: Good Italian food in Mascouche!  Lovely atmosphere with pretty authentic Italian food, good service and reasonable prices.   The chef/owner was very sweet and attentive; he came to introduce himself and chat after the meal and had a digestif with us.   Unpretentious and homey.
Great pizzas and pastas. Prices are well below average and the food is delicious!

I went there so many times and the food is great.  Sometimes I don't even check the menu I just asked the chef that I know very well to bring me something he has in mind and I never was disappointed.  I feel at home when I go there. You have to try it.  Price are very reasonable.
